A NYC woman was tragically killed by a flying solar panel during a nor'easter, while the city faces ongoing challenges including Broadway strikes, a bleak budget ahead of the mayoral race, and significant complaints from tenants regarding broker fees.

### Risks & Alerts

- NYC woman killed by flying solar panel during nor'easter. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMihgFBVV95cUxORklEZU1OYklkcVk5eFdtVExFeGZBVGdMXzdjN3ROTHJWQzdGR1JkTndjaEFJUm5rUUVfZTBDb1ptNEtHbllYZm01VUMwZ3hGREFqT1ZJY2FJbkdVQ1BiMEhHSURYc2JKNjI1c2Zia1FCWURXZ1BHb2tyaGt0dHZBNWE3M1Z5Zw?oc=5)
- Road closed in Hoboken as nor'easter continues. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
